pull.title: base58: Improve DecodeBase58 performance.
pull.body:
Improve DecodeBase58 performance the same way as commit 3252208 did
for EncodeBase58.

bench_bitcoin result for Base58Decode before and after the patch, each tested three times:
Before the patch:
# Benchmark,count,min,max,average

Base58Decode,524288,0.000000976440788,0.000002053217031,0.000001960330792
Base58Decode,524288,0.000000979518518,0.000001978729415,0.000001956941560
Base58Decode,524288,0.000000986496161,0.000001988708391,0.000001964757757

After the patch:
# Benchmark,count,min,max,average

Base58Decode,786432,0.000000660018486,0.000001336600690,0.000001329504509
Base58Decode,786432,0.000000668867870,0.000001348496880,0.000001338565805
Base58Decode,786432,0.000000656273187,0.000001334869012,0.000001324702074

That's about 32% decrease for the average time.

events.message:
base58: Improve DecodeBase58 performance.

Improve DecodeBase58 performance the same way as commit 3252208 did
for EncodeBase58.

events.body: @wjx Can you provide any numbers as to the performance improvement? Is it inline with what was seen in #7656?

events.message: Use prefix operator in for loop of DecodeBase58.

issue.title: Base58 cherries
issue.body:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6468 - fix CBitcoinExtKeyBase template
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7656 - Improve EncodeBase58
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8736 - base58: Improve DecodeBase58 performance
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10961 - Improve readability of DecodeBase58Check(...)

issue.title: [Backport] Base58 performance improvements
issue.body:
Coming from:

* bitcoin#6468 .
* bitcoin#7656 .
* bitcoin#7922
* bitcoin#8736 .
* bitcoin#10961 .

issue.title: Investigate upstream Encode and Decode Base 58 optimizations
issue.body:
Upstream PRs: 
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7656
> This change consists in avoiding filling the b58 buffer with zeros. The improvement is about 30% - 45%.
>
> For example, calling listunspents with my wallet results in 313ms in EncodeBase58 whereas before was 578ms.
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8736
> Improve DecodeBase58 performance the same way as commit 3252208 did
for EncodeBase58.
> ...
> That's about 32% decrease for the average time.

comments.body: [Comments](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7656/files#r56476755) from the original PR suggest you should use `++i` here.
